title: what is this??? O_O
body:
So I was in a game stomping as Katarina and when the game finished something popped up on my screen saying "You got his attention. You will be seeing him soon" WHAAAATTT????? I went to loot to check what this was and the item is called "sett's calling card" whaaaat.
https://imgur.com/a/XM8AvhV

replies.body: Opposite for me. Just got stomped 11 losses in a row and then got this same message and item.
Yea I just stomped a game as shaco and got this as well, got 27 kills I believe. Had been on a win streak beforehand as well.
Must be a teaser for the new champ that's on PBE at the moment! Not sure what it does but loot teasers aren't something they've done before so that's pretty neat!
